definition: used of mollusks, especially gastropods, as snails etc., a class of mollusks typically having a one-piece coiled shell and flattened muscular foot with a head bearing stalked eyes
details:
adjective
- used of mollusks, especially gastropods, as snails etc.
noun
- a class of mollusks typically having a one-piece coiled shell and flattened muscular foot with a head bearing stalked eyes
= synonyms: gastropod
